instructions: Open the Google Photos app and tap the horizontal bar menu on the top-left side of the screen. Select Trash . If you're on Android, tap the Restore link on the top-right side of the screen. If you're on iOS, tap Select . A transparent circle appears on the top-left side of each photo in the trash bin. Tap each one you want to restore. Once all the photos are selected, tap Restore at the bottom of the screen.
